name: Scorn In The Bayou 0.0.1
description:
I am currently trying to lock down the main game play loop of my project. There are other features I intend to include as the project advances, but any feed back on the core loop and design is greatly appreciated. 

Survey once tested:

https://forms.gle/TKKWFv5JaZyH2Do47

Controls:

WASD movement

Space: JUMP / Start Game

ESC: Close Game

E: sneak
